full_text: Shawn Paul Bradley  is an American and German  retired basketball player who played center for the Philadelphia 76ers, the New Jersey Nets and the Dallas Mavericks in the National Basketball Association . At 7 ft 6 in  tall, Bradley was one of the tallest players in NBA history. Though born in Landstuhl, West Germany, Bradley grew up in Castle Dale, Utah. During his playing career Bradley had the nicknames of "the enormous Mormon" and "the Stormin' Mormon".
title: Shawn Bradley
